description: During my tenure, I successfully completed the 3-month LEAP program, honing my teamwork and development skills. Additionally, I engineered a robust internal data product at Fidelity, aggregating diverse and organized data from across the organization. My active participation in cross-functional Scrum teams allowed me to collaborate on complex product development, engaging in iterative Sprints and adaptive responses to evolving requirements. Throughout my career, I consistently demonstrated proficiency in collaboration, whether in-person or in remote work settings

I coordinated a team of fellow undergraduate students to design and implement an application connecting companies with talented UNC Computer Science graduates. Additionally, I led debugging efforts and actively contributed to development using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Firebase.

I created algorithms for both generalized and specific web scraping, enabling efficient data extraction. Additionally, I effectively utilized an existing SQL database to store the collected data, ensuring seamless access and retrieval for business analytics and reporting purposes.
